title: Every time i try to forge keys i am Disconnected from pvp.net?
body:
every time i try and forge my hextech keys i am droped
 from pvp.net and so are my flatmates
it happens when ever any of us try and do it rito please
 its been like 2 weeks and we still cant use the hextech stuff

replies.body:
Happening to me also, starting to really test my patience...

Ive tried the steps that SephirothSG listed and that didn't solve anything, also allowed league of legends on firewall.

#Stumped

Hey there,

Could you try the steps on [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq7) knowledgebase article and let me know if that helps at all.
i cant do anything in the hextech section now i oped the store it drops me i try and forge a skin it drops me wtf is going on
